title: Dusk of Dawn - final sentence of the passage

content.question: The final sentence of the passage (Paragraph 4) moves from

choices.label: relating an incident to decrying its implications
citing universal truths to searching for exceptions
expressing an idea to demanding punishment for an action
showing forgiveness to taking personal responsibility for a mistake

content.answer: relating an incident to decrying its implications

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
